comment.author: Misha
comment.text: Once in awhile we are blessed with such a person who comes along to help save us mortals from ourselves. God be with her and bless her as she is constantly put down for her passion and love of all peoples on this planet.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: God is not with her! God is always for the underdog and that is Trump! If she is so great, why does she need Obama to campaign for her? Why does she have to manipulate African-Americans & Latinos? Why does she stoop so low to use innocent children? She is desperate and pathetic!! TRUMP 2016!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: God be with her and give her stamina, health, clear mind, acute decision making, and protection against evil. Amen.

replies.author: Brooke
replies.text: So nancy tell us what she did as Secretary of State. ❓❓
